LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Smartstore.Keycloak.Auth
LocaleResource.Value: Adds Keycloak authentication to the store using OpenID Connect.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Keycloak authentication:

  • Log in to your Keycloak Administration Console.
  • Select or create a Realm for your application.
  • Navigate to Clients and create a new client with Client type: OpenID Connect.
  • Set Client authentication to On to enable confidential access (client secret).
  • Add the Redirect URI shown below to the client's Valid redirect URIs list.
  • Copy the Client ID and Client Secret (from the Credentials tab) into the form below.
  • Enter your Keycloak server URL (Authority) and Realm name.

LocaleResource.Name: Authority.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The base URL of your Keycloak server (e.g., https://keycloak.example.com).

LocaleResource.Name: Realm.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the Keycloak realm to authenticate against.

LocaleResource.Name: ClientId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The OpenID Connect Client ID configured in Keycloak.

LocaleResource.Name: ClientSecret.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The client secret from the Credentials tab in Keycloak.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectUri.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The OAuth Redirect URI to be entered in Keycloak's Valid redirect URIs.
